member.name: T:ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense
member.summary: Represents a single expense entry in the Expense Tracker application. Implements INotifyPropertyChanged to support data binding in the UI.

member.name: E:ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes.

member.name: P:ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this expense.

member.name: P:ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the expense (e.g., "Groceries", "Gas").

member.name: P:ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense.Amount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount spent in this expense.

member.name: P:ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the expense occurred.

member.name: P:ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense.DisplayDate
member.summary: Gets a formatted string representation of the expense date.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense.OnPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Raises the PropertyChanged event for the specified property.
member.param: The name of the property that changed.

member.name: T:ExpenseTracker.Services.FileService
member.summary: Service for handling file I/O operations for expense data persistence. Uses JSON serialization to store and retrieve expense records.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.Services.FileService.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileService class.
member.param: Optional filename for the data store. Defaults to "expenses.json"

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.Services.FileService.SaveData(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ExpenseTracker.Models.Expense})
member.summary: Saves a collection of expenses to the JSON file.
member.param: The collection of expenses to save.
member.exception: Thrown when file I/O operation fails.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.Services.FileService.LoadData
member.summary: Loads expenses from the JSON file.
member.returns: A list of expenses, or an empty list if the file doesn't exist.
member.exception: Thrown when file I/O operation fails.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.Services.FileService.GetFilePath
member.summary: Gets the full file path for the data store.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.Services.FileService.FileExists
member.summary: Checks if the data file exists.
member.returns: True if the file exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:ExpenseTracker.ViewModels.MainViewModel
member.summary: Main view model for the Expense Tracker application. Manages the state of expenses, handles user interactions, and coordinates with the FileService.

member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes.

member.summary: Gets the observable collection of all expenses.

member.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected expense from the list. Populates input fields when an expense is selected.

member.summary: Gets or sets the description input for adding/editing expenses.

member.summary: Gets or sets the amount input for adding/editing expenses.

member.summary: Gets or sets the date input for adding/editing expenses.

member.name: T:ExpenseTracker.ViewModels.RelayCommand
member.summary: A generic command implementation for RelayCommand pattern. This implementation allows binding commands in MVVM patterns with support for can execute predicates.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.ViewModels.RelayCommand.#ctor(System.Action{System.Object},System.Predicate{System.Object})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RelayCommand class.
member.param: The action to execute when the command is invoked.
Optional predicate to determine if the command can be executed.

member.name: E:ExpenseTracker.ViewModels.RelayCommand.CanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the execution state of the command changes.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.ViewModels.RelayCommand.CanExecute(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the command can execute in its current state.
member.returns: True if the command can be executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.ViewModels.RelayCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the command.

member.name: M:ExpenseTracker.ViewModels.RelayCommand.RaiseCanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Raises the CanExecuteChanged event to notify that the command's execution state may have changed.
